nodes.text: Ivatch was a planet within the Kathol sector's Ivatch system, located within the Outer Rim Territories. Connected to the neighboring planets of Shintel and Peirs by hyperlanes, Ivatch supported a small colony whose economy was based around supplying ore and natural resources to Gandle Ott.

Ivatch was featured in The DarkStryder Campaign, a supplement for Star Wars: The Roleplaying Game by West End Games. Ivatch was not featured directly in any adventure, but was included to give background information on worlds within the Kathol sector. The 2009 reference book The Essential Atlas placed the Ivatch system, and therefore the planet Ivatch, in grid square M-21.
